message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.CC 

Reasoning: The paper deals with learning in contextual bandits, which is a subfield of machine learning. The paper also discusses algorithmic techniques for achieving optimal regret, which falls under the category of optimization. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also involves information theory (cs.IT) and computational complexity (cs.CC) in its analysis, which makes these sub-categories likely as well.
